Returns the maximum theoretically possible value of {{tt|n}}, for which the call {{box|{{lc|allocate}}{{c/core|(n, 0)}}}} could succeed. 

In most implementations, this returns {{c|std::numeric_limits&lt;size_type&gt;::max() / sizeof(value_type)}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
The maximum supported allocation size.
